title: Remembering An 'Unbroken' Hero Of WWII
teaser: In 2010, NPR's Scott Simon interviewed Laura Hillenbrand about her book Unbroken: A World War II Story of Survival, Resilience and Redemption. The hero of that book, Louis Zamperini, died this week.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
